Create a children's book about a young dragon who struggles to control their sneezes, but ultimately learns to embrace them as a unique part of themselves.
Develop an app that uses augmented reality to allow users to control the size and frequency of their dragon's sneezes.
Create a series of short films that follow the adventures of a group of dragons who use their sneezes to help others in need.
Design a board game where players must navigate through a maze filled with obstacles while trying to avoid their opponent's sneezes.
Write a song about a dragon who overcomes their fear of their sneezes by embracing them and learning to love themselves for who they are.
